name: Geodroid Tower Defense Game
description:
GEODROID : Geometric Droid Tower Defense Game

Introduction

It is a FPS + Tower Defense style game like Orcs must die or sanctum that was designed using the assets that are available in unreal and some primary models. It is my first game in unreal and was made in 3 weeks time.

Gameplay details:

1. Main Screen

2. Enemy Spawn

3. End Gate to protect

4. Primary Weapons

Turret Slow Trap

5. Enemy

Conclusion

Hope you like the game. I would  appreciate your feedback. Will improve me as a game developer.

Regards

Raz1789
